pullrequest.title: Camera intrinsics - conversion of y principal point from OpenCV to OpenGL

content.raw: after revisiting this PR, I think the important changes \(principal point y inversion\) have already been captured in the `default` branch \(when it was backported and merged forward\). The only difference between this branch and `default` is the renaming of the protected variable from `cameraProjectiveMatrix` to `cameraProjectionMatrix`. I’m tempted to leave it as is since I don’t think we’re deparecating any more? In that case, we should be able to just close this PR.
content.html: after revisiting this PR, I think the important changes (principal point y inversion) have already been captured in the default branch (when it was backported and merged forward). The only difference between this branch and default is the renaming of the protected variable from cameraProjectiveMatrix to cameraProjectionMatrix. I’m tempted to leave it as is since I don’t think we’re deparecating any more? In that case, we should be able to just close this PR.
